question: Which of the following Indian Universities has its jurisdiction all over India?
explanation: Sampurnanand Sanskrit Vishwavidyalaya is an Indian institution of higher learning located in Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh, India. It is specialzed in the study of Sanskrit and related fields. It is India's oldest university which is still functional. It's jurisdiction of the university extends all over India and it has more than 1,000 affiliated and recognised colleges and universities.
